doc:
Roy Fegan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roy_Fegan 0 Roy Fegan (born January 27, 1961 in Los Angeles, California) is an American actor, producer, director and president of 3inaRo Entertainment. He is best known for his role as Simon Caine in the 1993 film The Meteor Man. Some of his other acting credits include the television series The Shield, Will Grace, The Jamie Foxx Show, Matlock, Touched by an Angel, Martin, Married... with Children and Hangin' with Mr. Cooper. He also appeared in the video game Titanfall.Fegan is writer and producer of hit musical Treat Her Like a Lady. Besides The Meteor Man, Fegan has worked numerous times with actor/director Robert Townsend, first in the film Hollywood Shuffle (1987), along with I'm Gonna Git You Sucka (1988), The Five Heartbeats (1991) and episodes on the HBO television series Partners in Crime.Fegan guest-starred in the seventh episode of the second season of Scream Queens as Slade Hornborn, a reporter from the Northeast Journal of Medicine. He is the father of actor, producer, songwriter Roshon Fegan. Roy_Fegan ( born January_27_,_1961 in Los_Angeles , California ) is an_American_actor , producer_,_director_and_president of 3inaRo_Entertainment . He is_best_known for his_role as Simon_Caine in the_1993_film The_Meteor_Man . Some of his_other_acting_credits include the_television_series_The_Shield , Will_ , The_Jamie_Foxx_Show , Matlock , Touched by an_Angel_,_Martin_,_Married ... with Children_and_Hangin_' with Mr._Cooper . He also appeared in the_video_game_Titanfall.Fegan is writer_and_producer of hit musical_Treat_Her Like a_Lady . Besides The_Meteor_Man , Fegan has_worked numerous_times with actor/director_Robert_Townsend , first in the_film_Hollywood_Shuffle_(_1987_) , along with I 'm Gon na Git You Sucka (_1988_) , The_Five_Heartbeats ( 1991_)_and_episodes on the_HBO_television_series_Partners in Crime.Fegan guest-starred in the_seventh_episode of the_second_season of Scream_Queens as Slade_Hornborn , a_reporter from the_Northeast_Journal of Medicine . He is the_father of actor_,_producer_,_songwriter_Roshon_Fegan .
